definition: one paid to accompany or assist or live with another, to be a companion to somebody
details:
noun
- one paid to accompany or assist or live with another
- a friend who is frequently in the company of another
= example: a friend who is frequently in the company of another
= synonyms: familiar
- a traveler who accompanies you
= synonyms: fellow traveler, fellow traveller
verb
- to be a companion to somebody
= synonyms: company
